original_text: “Anyone who kidnaps someone is to be put to death, whether the victim has been sold or is still in the kidnapper’s possession.
korean_text: 사람을 납치한 자가 그 사람을 팔았든지 자기 수하에 두었든지 그를 반드시 죽일지니라

sentences.original_text: is to be put to death
whether the victim has been sold
or is still in the kidnapper's possession
